extension_description.message: Kyerɛ nsɛm a woapaw ase wɔ wɛbsaet krataafa no so na dan kɔ ɔkwan a wɔakyerɛ so.

turn_off_description.message: Translate button no bɛpue bere biara a wobɛpaw nsɛm no

turn_on_description.message: Translate button no renna adi bere a woapaw nsɛm nanso woda so ara betumi akyerɛ ase denam Pro Translate ahyɛnsode a wobɛma wɔ adwinnade pon no mu no so

ui_language.message: UI Kasa a Wɔde Di Dwuma

ui_language_description.message: Paw UI kasa a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ no

target_language_description.message: Paw kasa a wopɛ sɛ woka no

auto_switch.message: Dane kɔ kasa a ɛto so abien a wopɛ sɛ woka no so ara kwa

auto_switch_description.message: Sɛ nsɛm a woapaw no yɛ kasa a wɔde di dwuma wɔ ɔkwan a ɛfata so a, kyerɛ ase kɔ kasa a ɛto so abien a wode w’ani asi so no mu

second_target_language.message: Kasa a Ɛto so Abien a Wɔde Botae

second_target_language_description.message: Paw kasa a ɛto so abien a wode w’ani asi so a wɔahyɛ da ayɛ no

target_format_description.message: Paw default target format, format betumi asesa wɔ nkyerɛase panel mu

auto_set_format.message: Fa default format no si hɔ ankasa

auto_set_format_description.message: Sɛ wosakra format wɔ nkyerɛase panel mu a, fa format a woapaw no to default format so

format_and_order_description.message: Format cases a wobetumi asesa wɔ nkyerɛase panel ne display nhyehyɛe mu

translate_button_on_description.message: Translate button no bɛpue bere biara a wobɛpaw nsɛm no

translate_button_off_description.message: Translate button no renna adi bere a woapaw nsɛm nanso woda so ara betumi akyerɛ ase denam Pro Translate ahyɛnsode a wobɛma wɔ adwinnade pon no mu no so
